# Callouts

Normal paragraph.

> Quote
> Should not render as a Callout.

> [!info] Title
> Callout with custom title.

> [!info] Normal **Bold** _Italic_ $\text{Math}$
> Callout with custom title.

> [!info]
> Callout with default title.

> [!info] Callout without content.

> [!info]- Collapsible Callout (closed)
> Should be hidden.

> [!info]+ Collapsible Callout (open)
> Should be displayed.

> [!undefined]
> Callout with undefined type.

> [!note] Callout
> First level content.
>
> > [!abstract] Nested Callout
> > Second level content.

> [!note]
> Default `note` Callout.

> [!abstract]
> Default `abstract` Callout.

> [!summary]
> Default `summary` Callout.

> [!tldr]
> Default `tldr` Callout.

> [!info]
> Default `info` Callout.

> [!todo]
> Default `todo` Callout.

> [!tip]
> Default `tip` Callout.

> [!hint]
> Default `hint` Callout.

> [!important]
> Default `important` Callout.

> [!success]
> Default `success` Callout.

> [!check]
> Default `check` Callout.

> [!done]
> Default `done` Callout.

> [!question]
> Default `question` Callout.

> [!help]
> Default `help` Callout.

> [!faq]
> Default `faq` Callout.

> [!warning]
> Default `warning` Callout.

> [!attention]
> Default `attention` Callout.

> [!caution]
> Default `caution` Callout.

> [!failure]
> Default `failure` Callout.

> [!missing]
> Default `missing` Callout.

> [!fail]
> Default `fail` Callout.

> [!danger]
> Default `danger` Callout.

> [!error]
> Default `error` Callout.

> [!bug]
> Default `bug` Callout.

> [!example]
> Default `example` Callout.

> [!quote]
> Default `quote` Callout.

> [!cite]
> Default `cite` Callout.
